name: Go Green: Clean the ocean
description:
Garbage-grabbing time!
Let's grab them ALL, and save the ocean together!

Upgrade your scoop net so you can go further and catch more garbage as you explore the depths of the ocean. Find the garbage and figure out what lies at the bottom of the ocean!

More than a hundred unique garbage items for you to catch.
Try to catch them all!

Go Green! Features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay: Just Hold and Drag to catch garbage with your net!
- Idle Gameplay: The scoop net machine earns you money while you are away!
- Become the garbage catching Master: Over 100 garbage items for you to catch!
- Garbage gallery: see if you can catch them all!

This new Casual game is getting people addicted all over the world and being praised as the next top game!
